Body.Content:
On April 26, 2025, the Filter, sort, and search galleries with Copilot (preview) feature will have reached end of support.

How does this affect me?
This feature will no longer be available to users.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

Title: Power Apps - Information regarding the end of support for Filter, sort, and search galleries with Copilot (preview)
